ai-tika-vin05t32:299_0: “It is proper for a monk undertaking the trial period that he deserves to be given the trial period if he is undertaking the trial period when a regular monk is undertaking the trial period, he has a distributed at night.”
ai-tika-vin05t32:299_1: if he takes it on trust from him;
ai-tika-vin05t32:299_2: And that’s why if the mendicants live together with three nights, they just finished in three nights.
ai-tika-vin05t32:300_0: Thus there is the exposition of the teaching on the Monastic Law, in the preceding the Monastic Law
